0.name: Gauntlet of Clicking
0.description: A rare glove used by the previous King which has the ability to multiply your click damage by {relicEffect}. Use it wisely

1.name: Iron Sword
1.description: A standard issue sword given to new Mercenarys, offers a small {relicEffect} multiplier to mercenary damage

2.name: Old Pants
2.description: An old pair of pants which are not good for anything, besides offering a {relicEffect} boost to enemy gold

3.name: Berserk Potion
3.description: An extremely precious, and forbiddon, potion which is used to enrage your troops. Increases mercenary damage by {relicEffect}. Be careful with this new found power.

4.name: The Last Ring
4.description: This ring is unknown in its making, but we know its effects. Its wearer will enjoy a {relicEffect} bonus to boss gold

5.name: Forbidden Scroll
5.description: A scroll which contains a forbidden tap technique. Multiplies your tap damage by {relicEffect}
